Articles.Content:
I've been working with EsvDefcon on producing this parts pack. While we finish gearing up for the imminent first release, I figured I'd start posting up some WIP shots of parts that have gone/will be going into the mod in the future, and test renders to show them off a bit. As well, various development-related posts will be made here, and any bug reports should be made here.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

If there are any questions or comments regarding the models, I'd be more than happy to hear them.
